title: Bug 5340: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
description: When attempting to cancel the process of adding an exception breakpoint in the breakpoints pane of the debug perspective, clicking the cancel button does not have any effect.
OB: After clicking the cancel button in the progress dialog, the exception breakpoint is still added to the breakpoints pane.
EB: After clicking the cancel button in the progress dialog, the exception breakpoint should not be added to the breakpoints pane.
SR: 1) Open the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective2) Click the J! button to add an exception breakpoint3) In the progress dialog, click the cancel button and verify that the exception breakpoint is not added to the breakpoints pane.
